biotools.summary: HiCBin is a new open-source metagenomic Hi-C-based binning pipeline to recover high-quality MAGs. HiCBin employs the HiCzin normalization method and the Leiden community detection algorithm, and includes the spurious contact detection into binning pipelines for the first time.

bioschemas.name: HiCBin
bioschemas.summary: HiCBin is a new open-source metagenomic Hi-C-based binning pipeline to recover high-quality MAGs. HiCBin employs the HiCzin normalization method and the Leiden community detection algorithm, and includes the spurious contact detection into binning pipelines for the first time.
